full_text.full_text:
Types of Classifiers
▪ There are many ways to distinguish classifiers
– Binary vs. Multiclass
– Deterministic vs. Probabilistic
– Linear vs. Nonlinear
– Global vs. Local
– Generative vs. Discriminative
▪ We discuss alternative techniques for building classifiers
– Nearest neighbor classifiers, Bayesian networks, logistic regression, 
artificial neural networks, ensemble methods, …
2
